attributes.action: ..question whether its serving the best interest of Londoners to allow Ken Livingston, or any other individual the power to override the population of London when it comes to transport/regeneration and building
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This doesn't seem democratic to me. If Ken Livingstone wants to build a Walkie Talkie he can, if he wants to create a congestion charge he can. Whilst I don't disagree with everything Ken has decided I think allowing one man the power to override the public vote is unfair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
